name: Big Fracking Flashlight
description:
'Allan Must' adventure to Mars. Control the spaceship 'Big Fracking Flashlight' and help Allan reach his distination to follow his biggest dreams. 

Youtube
Soundcloud

This is my prototype of the 3rd tema Project Boost. I'm doing a udemy.com course named: Learn C# Code by Making Games - Complete Unity Developer 2.0 by Ben Tristem, Rick Davidson, GameDev.tv.
